text:
Company: Martin-Kennedy  
Role: Senior Title Examiner  

Company Background:  
Martin-Kennedy is a leader in providing comprehensive title insurance and settlement services. We are committed to fostering a workplace that values inclusivity, accessibility, and the contributions of all employees. We believe in equal opportunities for all candidates and strive to create a supportive environment.

Job Type: Full-time  

Job Description:  
As a Senior Title Examiner at Martin-Kennedy, you will be responsible for examining property titles to determine their legal status. You will play a critical role in ensuring that our clients have clear and marketable titles. Our recruitment process is inclusive and accessible, and we welcome candidates of all abilities to apply.

Responsibilities:  
- Examine and verify titles, ensuring accuracy and legal compliance.  
- Conduct detailed title searches and prepare title reports.  
- Identify and resolve issues impacting title integrity.  
- Collaborate with legal professionals and clients to facilitate transactions.  
- Maintain organized records of title documents and transactions.

Qualifications and Experience Needed:  
- Bachelor’s degree in a related field or equivalent work experience.  
- Minimum of 5 years of experience in title examination.  
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.  
- Excellent written and verbal communication abilities.  
- Proficiency in title software and databases.

Perks and Benefits:  
- Competitive salary ranging from $70,000 to $90,000, based on experience and skills.  
- Comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance.  
- Retirement savings plan with company match.  
- Generous paid time off and holiday schedule.  
- Professional development and continuing education opportunities.  

We are committed to fair and equitable pay practices. The salary for this position ranges from $70,000 to $90,000, based on your experience and skills.
